p: Nigella sativa seed ethanolic extract supplementation (200 mg/kg/day, p.o.) in control, moderately trained, and over-trained rats changed the cytokines profile. Immediately after exercise, IL-6, IL-10, and TNF-α were increased while IL-4 was decreased in rats’ serum. Moreover, IFNγ/IL-4 ratio significantly increased in animals treated with the plant extract (Gholamnezhad et al. 2014).
